pre_conversation.line: We should hurry, time waits for no one.
I'm ready to face whatever comes our way.
This place is filled with mysteries waiting to be uncovered.
Are you sure we can trust them?
Let's make sure we're fully prepared before moving forward.
The situation is more complicated than I anticipated.
Stay alert. We don't know what might be lurking around.
I have a bad feeling about this.
We need to act quickly if we want to succeed.
Do you think we'll be able to solve this puzzle?
Our enemies are getting stronger. We must adapt.
Let's regroup and plan our next move.
I've encountered similar challenges before. I can help.
This mission is critical. We cannot afford any mistakes.
Keep your guard up; we might be ambushed at any moment.
I'll handle the situation from here. You focus on the objective.
We need to find a safe place to rest and recover.
I'm not sure we're ready for what's ahead.
There's something strange about this place. Be careful.
I've got a plan. Follow my lead.
This is going to be tougher than I thought.
Let's see if we can find any clues around here.
If we work together, we can overcome any challenge.
I'll keep an eye out for any threats.
We should explore this area more thoroughly.
Do you have any idea what we're dealing with?
We might need to rethink our strategy.
The enemy seems to be one step ahead of us.
I'm confident we can complete this mission successfully.
Let's check in with the team and assess the situation.
I'll take care of the defensive line. You focus on the attack.
We must remain vigilant. Our enemies are cunning.
This is just the beginning. We have a long way to go.
